snippet.title: UNTETHER.talks Clip: Amber Mac talks micro social networks and utilitarian apps
snippet.description:
UNTETHER.talks Clip: Amber Mac talks micro social networks and utilitarian apps from UNTETHER.tv. Like this? Watch the latest episode of UNTETHER.tv on Blip! http://blip.tv/untether/watch 

You know her as a href="http://www.ambermac.com" target="_blank"Amber Mac/a, author of Power Friending, columnist for the Globe and Mail, videographer for Fast Company magazine, host of AppCentral on CTV, host of her video podcast CommandN and co-host of The Social Hour on the TWIT Network. She was also the opening keynote for UNTETHER.talks in June and this is a clip of her stellar performance.

Amberapos;s talk focused on the 10 innovative ways the second screen is shaping the future of social - an apropos launching point for the show. In this clip we reveal the first two of her 10 mobile/social trends for the rest of 2012: The micro social network and the Utilitarian App. This is short clip of her much longer and informative presentation - which you can watch in its entirety, plus a post-presentation QA a href="http://untether.tv/2012/the-smartphone-network-10-innovative-ways-the-second-screen-is-shaping-the-future-of-social/" title="The Smartphone Network:  10 innovative ways the second screen is shaping the future of social"here/a.

For more episodes, visit http://www.untether.tv

See all episodes of UNTETHER.tv http://blip.tv/untether#EpisodeArchive
Visit UNTETHER.tv's series page http://blip.tv/untether
